column4: hi all.  Trying to install 12.04 to dual-boot and I'm hitting a problem.
It seems my grub is borked.  I'm getting a device not found message when I try to boot after installing.  won't let me get to ubuntu or my windows partition either one
anyone have any suggestions on how to fix from there?  It goes to "device not found" string of device ID that I didn't write down, and then I get a grub rescue> prompt
have you tried update-grub from rescue? Might require remount with write perm
